body.p:
Lebanon Ky.
Nov 3d 1863
Tho. E. Bramlette
Gov. of Ky.
Frankfort
Ky
Dr Sir:

If I should organize a cavalry Battallion under the state Guard Law in the counties of Marion, Washington, Taylor & Casey, would they be received? And would you commission me as Major, -- upon the recommendation of course of these companies? -- I do not doubt that a battallion could be easily raised, & with your permission, and assurance that they shall be properly Equipped, I will
attempt the organization of such a Battallion. Please let me hear from you soon on this subject.
In case you decline giving me permisison to raise a Battallion of Cavalry, can permisison be obtained to raise a company of Cavalry under the state guard Law, in my county- Marion? --

Marion Co
Nov. 3. 1863
J M. Fidler

States that he can raise a Cavalry Company for State Guard --
Answered
Recd I. G. O. Nov. 5. 1863
